column1: Petitioner [hereinafter sometimes referred to as the Petitioner] invoked the revisionary jurisdiction

column2: The learned High Court Judge has erred in Law in determining that settled Law of the
country is to convert appeals into revisions, when there is no right of appeal granted by
The learned High Court Judge has erred in Law  by failing to give any reasons as to
why the appeal of the Respondent required to be converted into a revision.
